conclusion: Analyze acceleration-time graph to understand velocity changes.
Graph shows acceleration over time with a positive slope.
Acceleration is positive from 0 to 2 seconds.
Acceleration is negative from 2 to 4 seconds.
Velocity-time graph is inverse of acceleration-time graph.
Velocity-time graph has a negative slope, indicating decreasing velocity.
Velocity is positive from 0 to 2 seconds.
Velocity is negative from 2 to 4 seconds.
Velocity is at maximum when velocity-time graph intersects time axis.
Velocity-time graph intersects time axis at 2 seconds.
